post_info.post_title: Some of my favorite actors and actresses...

Anyone in any John Waters' film.

It would be far easier for me to provide you a list of actors and actresses that I hate, than rack my brain trying to think of the select few that I actually like. Of course, this is the result of their illogical illiberalism. If they didn't feel the need to tell me their opinions on animal cruelty, and the like, I would have no reason to avoid certain movies with certain "stars".
